name: The Art of I'm Oh, So Busy - Artbook & Wallpapers
name_original: The Art of I'm Oh, So Busy - Artbook & Wallpapers
description:
If you enjoyed I'm Oh, So Busy...: A Week with Yoshimi and all of the colorful, vibrant artwork that's in it then The Art of I'm Oh, So Busy is for you! 

🍓 Contains: 

  • 46 pages featuring sketches and concept art with commentary from the developer covering explanations of the game's creation and layout. 
  • Backgrounds, cutscenes, sprites, GUI, logos, object designs, game posters, and promotional material. 
  • 10 wallpapers featuring backgrounds and various scenes from the game. 

All revenue from this artbook will go towards the creation of more games in the future. 

🍓 Credits: 

  • Assembly and Production - Sunbiscuit
  • Backgrounds - Fuyu no Kawa
  • All other assets - Erickiwi 
  • Commentary - berry

If you'd like to learn more about The Berry Guild, check us out on berryswebsite.com! All social media links, store pages, and the development log are located there. You can also reach me directly at theberryguild@gmail.com if you have any questions or comments. Thanks for stopping by!
